headline: Republic Services Again Named to Dow Jones Sustainability World and North America Indices
summary: For the ninth consecutive year, Republic Services, Inc. (NYSE: RSG), a leader in the environmental services industry, has been named to the Dow Jones Sustainability Indices (DJSI), which represent best-in-class sustainability benchmarks for the world's leading companies. Republic Services ranked first in its industry on the North America Index and is the only North American company in its industry to be included on the World Index.
